column5: I might be in Kingston the weekend of Nov 20th for a two day Taekwondo tournament with my daughter and wife.  They both said I could go fishing if i want to!  I have no clue of what to even fish for out that way.  Any suggestions ?  Thanks  Splashhopper

Kingston Mills/ My dad and grandfather used to guide up there and all through the rideau lake system.There are many places to shore fish in and around the rideau locks system.Its about 5 miles from downtown kingston Excellent bass pike and carp fishing.
no need to post specific places.... a PM if you want to is appreciated though.  Thanks mercman..

my pleasure Ron  No secret spot there. Plus, i'm pretty sure that any OFNer is respectful enough not to ruin it for someone else. I still have familly on my dads side there, and apparently the fishing is still good.Would like to hear about it if you do go.
